long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OORT is a wallet in the OORT ecosystem. Itâ€™s a browser extension that allows users to access OORT funds and other applications.

Users can receive & send funds, read OORT balance, and use other applications with OORT. 

It serves as one of the most essential tools for OORT ecosystem: miners can receive mining rewards with OORT; users like VR/AR game developers can rent high-quality virtual machines with OORT; and of course, OORT token holders can receive and hold coins with OORT.

OORT also lets the user create and manage their own identities via private keys, so when a Dapp wants to perform a transaction and write to the blockchain, the user gets a secure interface to review the transaction, before approving or rejecting it.
